title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, October 14, 2013
teaser: Whether in the art world or in the email world, fakes can create big problems. So what about in the tech world of startups and acquisitions? The fortune of a small Swedish biometrics company changed dramatically recently, all thanks to a single document that wasn't what it said it was. And we take a look at the future of robot coworkers.
